text: Up to 70% people pass in the first round of placement which is aptitude I get messages from many students that Sumer bhai, I am not able to pass aptitude I am not even getting a chance to tell my skills So in this video, I am going to tell you in complete road How to crack aptitude with proper syllabus and resources So do watch this video till the end So how are you friends? Welcome to Last Moment Tuitions My name is Sumer Singh Rajpreet Today's topic is How to Crack Aptitude Placement season is here, companies are coming in college, off campus So in the first round, you are passing aptitude You are not able to crack it Some are doing Ratta, some are doing something else Some are blanking in the paper No worries, in this video, I will tell you in complete road How to crack it I have divided the video into three parts The first part is what to study Proper syllabus should be known Second is how to study, proper strategy should be known Third is how to crack the aptitude That bro, the final tip is important Because of this, people are making mistakes There is a bonus, how much time will it take I am going to give you a proper plan Let's understand things one by one First comes what to study Proper syllabus So in three parts, there is aptitude Quantitative, verbal and reasoning These are some important topics that every company asks There will be one or two more But every company asks So you have to do 19-20 topics of quantitative Take a screenshot You will get this free in our app, you can see that too Second is you have to do these 7-8 topics of verbal And the third is reasoning You have to do these topics First of all, save this Make a list, take a screenshot, do anything First is, it is very important to know the syllabus Only then you will be able to study If you don't know what to study, will you study? Clear? So you have to do this first Okay, done Now let's come to the second, how to study People don't know the strategy, people make mistakes Then they can't crack So how to study is very important I have been helping kids to crack aptitude for 7-8 years I have taught a lot of aptitude And at least 1000 kids have cracked aptitude through me So this is a method that I have learned, I want to share it with you First of all, assume you have taken a topic, time and world You have to read it
